review: It's been working great so far!
author: bernadette

review: I am so pleased with this little tech gadget!  Super easy to install; had it done in a matter of minutes.  Also, very user-friendly.  Love being able to watch movies/programs on my big TV.  Plus, similar products are much more expensive than the Fire Stick.
author: Boxer Lover "Luv2read"

review: Works great. Easy set up. Makes your TV a smart TV.
author: Ginny Hogan

review: still not provide streaming for out of US territory , even am still interesting in buying renting some series and movies.
author: Mountaineer

review: I LOVE the Fire TV Stick.  I highly recommend it!
author: Dahlra

review: Works great! Installed Kodi app on the firestick and ditched cable.
author: jeremy shirey

review: It's great for movie night with the family and downloading the hottest apps. Become a member and it's like almost everything is prime. My only concern is not being able to go to amazon site to purchase products.
author: TaShaka McMillion

review: Absolutely does everything it says it will.  Works great on the older flat screens that are not "Smart TV's" or internet capable. A great product and a good investment.  Cheaper than buying a new TV.  It's easily mobile between TV's. but I am going to order two more, so I don't have to switch it out.  I do however recommend you have a strong wireless router that can handle multiple devices.
author: Barry Stewart
